website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive and perfectly sized for two, this is a great option for a balcony or other small space.
pros: This sturdy little metal and tempered glass table is easy to assemble, and the smooth glass top makes cleaning a breeze — just wipe it down with a damp cloth
cons: There is no hole to accommodate a patio umbrella

customer_reviews.title: Great table !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table. I just got it... basically to replace another table I had with some whicker chairs... I lost the glass from my other table... so I decided to just buy a new table. And well, here it is... Looks great with my other chairs. I basically zen out and use it for my laptop computer and breakfast on the patio etc. Great table ! But it. Speaker Mr. Awesome Erik Swanson
customer_reviews.author: Speaker Erik Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This table is a great addition to my patio. It was easy to put together, included the necessary tools, and arrived safely. Nothing was broken and one person can easily do it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitecrow

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the worst thing I’ve ever purchased on Amazon. I don’t know if I got a defective unit or what, but mine was so warped and messed up that it was impossible to assemble. The holes for the legs were in the wrong spot on the glass piece; the legs were bent in the wrong shape and too short. Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice small table for the price. Attractive and sturdy looking for my front porch. Downfall is there was a dented area on one side of the rim around the glass, the finish was rough, and the table wobbles as one leg seems shorter than others.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE YOUNG

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It arrived nicely packed with all the pieces. It was easy to put together and only need the tool provided. I did all the bolts loosely at first, just tightening by hand, doing the bottom ones diagonally first then the top so I could jiggle the legs a bit into place.I didn't do the bolts uber tight as I didn't want to risk stripping the threads. It's a nice size for two people to sit and eat at - and looks good - and at a great price! A few stratches on the legs showing the metal undernieath but plan to touch it up using a sharpie.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This table is just right for my deck. It is sturdy (doesn't move when the Santa Ana winds are assaulting it), easy to clean, affordably priced, and looks nice. Another perk, the spiders don't seem to care to use it as a home as there are no nooks and crannies really to hide in (we had black widows do this all of the time with our old table and chair set). Yay!
customer_reviews.author: MistyShadows

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic table. Easy to assemble. The glass is very thick and beautifully textured. The legs are very strong and stable. I'm really happy with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together but arrived eith the paint finish ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent table. Easy to put together but arrived eith the paint finish on the legs totally scatched up. Very disappointed. Not able to recommend a product that isn't checked out beforere packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the patio table it's medium size impact glass ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the patio table it's medium size impact glass like my extra large patio table in my Summer home. Easy to assemble comes packed well
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: High quality very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy well-built small table that we have on our patio. I actually have two sets of the flash furniture table and chairs on our upper patio. It’s very easy to assemble only four legs to hook onto the top if you have a drill with a Allen wrench tip it makes it much faster. I have no negatives to say about this table the only bad would be it took 3 to 4 weeks to actually receive the table both tables were ordered separately
customer_reviews.author: Brent L. Portschy

customer_reviews.title: Great Price. Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a couple extra tables and chairs on my patio. When we have a bbq-just the patio furniture is not enough seating for eating. I now have 4 extra small tables. "I already had 2 nice ones from years ago." **I liked it so much I ordered a 2nd. ***I decided we needed 1 more table----------------surprise--paid $29.97 on 3/12/20 and 3/20/20 and now $67. Toooo much for me. Guess I'll wait till this winter and ck on the price. SAD.
customer_reviews.author: CAROL/No. ID

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and very easy to put together, I did it in under 5min.
customer_reviews.author: @ngelo

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. It came together in ten minutes. It is heavy-duty and looks beautiful! It's all matte black except for the glass top which is a bubbled-finished glass and quite thick. It's just the right size for drinks on the balcony. It's big enough for a small dinner for two. I priced these at a big warehouse club and this was a better product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Flava

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table!
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for dinner for two on our screened porch. Our porch is narrow with other seating and this fits perfectly. We also love the glass top. It alleviates the need to use place mats on a "metal mesh" table. The table is large enough for us to sit opposite each other and use 10.5 inch dinner plates plus beverage glasses. The price was right,too.
customer_reviews.author: Jo in Northern MI

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage. Half of the nuts weren't in right and ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Half of the nuts weren't in right and turn when trying to screw in the bolts. Side of the top of the table isn't welded all the way together.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lott

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized table for a balcony
customer_reviews.text: I downsized my living arrangement lately due to health reasons, so needed a smaller patio table to tuck into the corner of my balcony, this is just perfect. The table came packed well, took me about 30 minutes to put together. It is a good solid table, it is not going anywhere in bad weather. Put a couple flower pots on it in the far corner, and a couple chairs around it, perfect for sitting outside and enjoying the fall days!
customer_reviews.author: VeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Rusted Immediately
customer_reviews.text: We assemble this table and set it on our patio. After one day and a light rain, there was rust all over our patio and the table edges were holding water. Super disappointed as we bought two of these. Must keep covered even though they are inexpensive and meant for outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Compact table at an awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something the same height as my hottub and found this sturdy table at a bargin price. Almost half the cost of other tables at the same or better quality than the more expensive ones. Easy to assemble. Arrives in 2 days. Nice black finish with a smooth glass top for easy cleaning. These pictures were taken after a rain storm and the table proves it can hold up in the worst of conditions.
customer_reviews.author: George Brannen

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality control nearly ruins what might otherwise be a fine product
customer_reviews.text: Poorly crafted. Unnecessarily difficult to assemble. Captive nuts for the screws poorly secured by plastic, so some will easily turn when you try to tighten with the included barely usable wrench. Screw and screw holes don't line up well. In short, very poor quality control for what might otherwise be a fine product. If you happen to get one where everything lines up and the captive nuts don't spin in place, you'll likely be satisfied. If not, you might be irritated enough to call the customer support number - only to be told the number is disconnected.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Liars
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few times to show picture of how they lie about their product but for some reason amazon keeps deleting my pictures. It is not 31.5", it is 27.5". Those 4 inches make a huge difference when you are doing a project and the item no longer fits the need you intended. I'm extremely disappointed because there is no reason to lie about the height if something
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good purchase 👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy table for your $. I put it together in 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: SheilaT

customer_reviews.title: Great table for small decks!  A must have
customer_reviews.text: This table took me maybe 20 min to put together. Not sure why other reviewers had issues. Got the table in 3 days, packed solidly. Unboxed and put it together. It is a great table and very sturdy. For this price I would not hesitate to purchase. Very pleased and just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: engster

customer_reviews.title: So sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my balcony! Easy to assemble. Had to use my own wrench though as the one provided was too small at one and and too large at the other. There was a dent in the molding but I can easily live with it as it will be outside and the table is so sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small outdoor table!
customer_reviews.text: A great table! High quality thick glass, very sturdy - looks like tables 3x its cost. It was packed well, arrived without a scratch. Easy to assemble... set glass top upside down on table or floor, slip leg poles into place on top and middle piece, and you're done! Perfect for a small patio like mine. Would not hesitate to buy again from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: Works for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to place on our back deck which is rather small. It fits in the corner perfectly and a medium sized planter sets on top. There's still plenty of room for a glass of lemonade and a snack plate. Glad I got it for the price I did.
customer_reviews.author: ND customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable smallish table
customer_reviews.text: Great table for my smallish deck. It's been out in the weather for a month now and shows no signs of it. You could seat four in a pinch, most likely good for two. Great for playing cards or eating on the deck. I can easily recommend
customer_reviews.author: Endocrantz

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cheap glass table for my tiny apartment. Regular dining tables cost twice as much as this indoor/outdoor patio table. This table is just the right size for my space. I wish it was an inch or two taller but it still fits the bill. It was delivered in a timely manner and was easy to unpack and put together in about 20 minutes. I am going to put some lights under it around the metal strip and see how that looks. Four people would be cramped but doable, for two people it is perfect. I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Ebookmaven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  Table for Two
customer_reviews.text: We added a small porch on the house and I wanted a small table for eating for the 2 of us. This table is perfect. It does not take up a lot of room but plenty of room to eat. It is sturdy and easy for one person to put together.
customer_reviews.author: likes2read

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have a small condo patio and purchased this to have a place to sit the morning coffee on or play a table game while sitting on the porch. It works well for that. It was easy to assemble and serves us well.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Bamboo

customer_reviews.title: Great table at an awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this table!! Perfect for our small deck. We have even gotten three around it to eat. Putting it together took about 20 minutes. Had directions and came with a little wrench. The packaging was excellent and everything arrived in perfect condition and driver was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice patio table.
customer_reviews.text: This table is just perfect for what we need on our patio. It's big enough for the two of us to eat at, but small enough so that it doesn't take up much space. Fairly easy to assemble, pretty sturdy, I think it's a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave L.

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: The table is nice, had a few scratches on the legs, the instructions don't seem to mention the round clear disks on the top of the metal frame need to be in place before your attach the legs to the table top. The table was shipped very quickly. I really like the table. Nice quality, except for a few scratches on the legs. I will order more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: terri williams

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: One of the legs would not attach. Not matter how much I twist the screw it did not make a difference. And I cannot take it apart to return it. So now i have a useless table. Waste of money and time. :( I am disappointed because it is a really pretty table and it is the perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Although I wished it had cost less, it was exactly what I wanted. I was able to put it together by myself. It doesn't move when the wind blows on my outside porch. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table see assembly suggestions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble IF you a-line screws with holes and tighten each one a little at a time. Be sure legs are in squarely in corners before you begin. Great table for price. 4 chairs fit around nicely
customer_reviews.author: Inspiring glass

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed! It’s a great little table for the money. Purchased this for an outdoor dining area for 2. Perfect! My only complaint is the wrench slips easily and scratches the black. The wrench provided is cheap, does the job but slips easily.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Flash Furniture 23.5” square tempered glass table
customer_reviews.text: This product was not difficult to assemble except for the little Mickey Mouse wrench that was supplied. It turned out (almost) perfect. It has a slight wobble but it’s hardly noticeable. It’s a very lovely table and well worth the price. I will buy a few more for the back patio. This one is on the front porch.
customer_reviews.author: IHF

customer_reviews.title: Had it up in 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for front porch or back patio. Not to big or too small. If you haven't put something like this together before, be sure line up the legs to form an X. The grips the legs go into slide a bit so you can make the slight adjustment. once they were in place I had no problem getting the screws in straight without feeling forced.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lisk

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: One of the holes was misaligned but after about 20 minutes with a screw driver, I managed to widen it enough so the screw would finally fit through. Great finished product and assembly was insanely easy. Don't waste your money on professional asseblmbly it's literally just lining the legs up and screwing them into the stabilizers. Very sturdy and perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Trish Equinoa

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the patio
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a side/patio table for my little porch area at my apartment but I need something taller than a traditional side table to play cards...etc. This was excellent I had bought a small one for lowes for double the price this was an awesome find.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Neely

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for two people
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted for our deck! Perfect size for two people, but definitely would be crowded with four. This was a little more difficult to assemble than some other things I have done recently, largely due to the screws not lining up perfectly and the included disposable tool didn’t seem like it quite fit. Attractive and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hartsough

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit for my front deck
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small enough table to not take over my front porch deck; but still big enough to sit drinks and snacks on for a nice afternoon or early morning breeze. Very easy to put together, just couldn't seem to get those bolt covers on to give the full look of an all black table.
customer_reviews.author: Luann Norfleet

customer_reviews.title: The table is so cute, that it almost makes up for the torturous assembly process.
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: It's the perfect height for the 2 chairs we already had, and turns our small patio into an intimate dinning area. The price was definitely right. Con's: This was incredibly hard to put together. It took both of us just to get it lined up to put the screws in.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT..EASY AND BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Whoever wrote a negative report must either be the competition or doesn't know how to follow simple assembly instructions. I just received this table at my door UPS and it took all of 20 minutes to assemble..easy as pie. The leg holes are just in the right place, legs are not bent, short or out of shape at all. Just tighten each screw a little bit, go to the next one..keep going around like this until all aligns...it's the easiest assembly piece I've ever done, and it's lovely..for indoor or outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah H.

customer_reviews.title: If you can't say something nice...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this table for about 2 months. Good size for scrabble board, however: 1) Parts list is not accurate 2) Parts were missing 3) Customer service - CustomerExperience @belnickinc.com did not respond to any of my requests for the missing parts 4) Rim around the table is separating where the two ends were joined together On a scale of 1 to 10 overall rating is 0
customer_reviews.author: scrabble player

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The holes on one of the legs didn’t line up with the rest. Took forever to force the thing together and now it wobbles like crazy. If it weren’t for the one leg being made wrong it would be a nice table, but it’s esentially garbage because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice looking patio table
customer_reviews.text: This table is great! It was easy to assemble and the price was decent. I was really surprised about the size of the table as I imagined it to be a lot smaller, but was happy with the size. While screwing the nut in, the screwdriver scraped some part of the paint(the leg area) , but that was fine by me. I just hope it doesn’t rust.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Melligeri

customer_reviews.title: We love our new patio table
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome product! Fast delivery and simple, quick assembly. The product was also very well packaged to prevent shipping damage!! We have it on an uncovered patio that gets a lot of evening sun and it has performed beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Ross David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Needed a Table for my Patio
customer_reviews.text: And this was a good choice, it's small where it doesn't take up the whole patio but big enough where you can eat a meal on it. Seems pretty sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I like the size of table
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of table, but when it was made buy company they did a poor job of centering the insert on the table top. When I put legs in slot provided it wasn't centered correctly. I was able to use it but one of the legs are not perfectly level. I didn't report it and I'm sure they would have replaced it with a different one, but I didn't want to go through the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Rod E.

customer_reviews.title: This table is the perfect size for that apartment patio that can only accommodate ...
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect size for that apartment patio that can only accommodate a little more than a bistro set. The great part is that it's table height; wonderful for a nice meal place for two.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Narrow Porch!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small table to use on my narrow porch, and this one fit the bill. I wanted something that could hold two plates, so my husband and I could enjoy Saturday breakfasts outside. This table is sturdy, easy to assemble, and just the right size for my space.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Needed an outdoor “sit stuff down” table and this was perfect. Seems very sturdy, easy size to deal with, and looks like it will last well. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kady Booker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table! 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Awesome size and price! We got the 23.5 size for our small patio and is a perfect fit! Little caps for the bolt heads are cumbersome to install but other then that it is easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy C.

customer_reviews.title: Big fan!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan! Perfect size for two outdoor chairs. It was a little difficult to put together by myself, but nothing too crazy. Probably took me around 15 minutes to assemble. Way better price than tables at other stores I’ve looked it. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Far surpassed my expectations! Sturdy, well made & easy to assemble by this 71 year old grandma! I highly recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: MorMor to 5!

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted and decorated
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this table...chairs not included so don'tmisrake the picture fir what is coming
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and elegant outdoor glass table!
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and elegant outdoor glass table! Simple to assemble and very sturdy! Affordable patio table and I paired it with café type chairs for a nice, modern patio set for around $100! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Brooklyn Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great price for quality.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little table for a small patio/balcony. Great quality and was easy to assemble, came with the tools required. Impressed especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall_fire12

customer_reviews.title: Assembly difficult due to manufacturing flaws
customer_reviews.text: Seems there was little quality control. The little sleeves in the corners of table where the legs go were not corner centered in 2 corners. This made it extremely difficult for even 2 people to force together. We did manage to get the legs screwed into the 2 round supports. It seems solid for now & hope it stays that way but if the sleeves would have been centered on all 4 corners it would have assembled easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hargraves

customer_reviews.title: Great value and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: More durable than what I expected. Definitely worth the money. And it’s larger than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice and sturdy. Exactly what I was looking for my patio and the price was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kayak4Fun

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love my table... It was easy to assemble and all.... It hold up fountain well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Jinks

customer_reviews.title: A good value!
customer_reviews.text: This table is just as advertised and works perfectly with my existing chairs! I’m giving four stars because there were a couple of scratches on one of the legs and edge of table. I had black spray paint and they covered easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy P Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable
customer_reviews.text: Love this little table. It's smallish but 4 people fit well. During parties i have had as many as 6 conjuring around this with chairs spread around with tasty snacks and drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Pillitiere

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my back porch. Came well packed and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Clay

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it's a table
customer_reviews.text: -The quality is good - Easily assembled, a baby can do it - Comes with tools and hardware needed to assemble - One of the screws was damaged and needed replacing, luckily I have screws of my own - Makes a good indoor or outdoor table - Table looks as pictured - Table is lightweight and easy to move around _ Table is sturdy Worth the money, this is the second one I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. Easy to assemble..... even by one person.
customer_reviews.author: TKO4JESUS

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, nice size. Looks like it will last
customer_reviews.author: circumspect

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble, however after crossing that hurdle it is a very nice table :-)
customer_reviews.author: Richard Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice table!
customer_reviews.text: This table is very sturdy and nice. The price was unbeatable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Rae White

customer_reviews.title: Missing all hardware!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible as it arrived with missing parts: C (2), D(8), F, E(8). All that came was the glass top and legs. NO parts to screw the legs to top, missing all hardware!!!!! Don’t bother to order!!! Zero stars
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and nice looking. Sturdy table for various outdoor uses.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Have it sitting next to my spa to put drinks, MP3 player, cells phones, etc on. Great height for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: J. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Assembled easily.
customer_reviews.text: Went together without problems. Feels sturdy, yet light enough to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Good Table For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good table for the price and the tempered glass top has a nice texture to it. I would buy it again in a heart beat !
customer_reviews.author: n.b

customer_reviews.title: Table arrived scratched and chipped
customer_reviews.text: We like the table however it arrived in an undamaged box but with scratches and chips on the black legs. Since it is an outdoor table, we will keep it. (If I had bought it locally I would have returned it)
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This table does NOT assemble correctly, legs do not line up with the slots .... Extremely disappointed frustrated! Putting up pics......and yes, I know the legs are to be attached (to each other) last but wanted to see how "off" it was.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice table. Just the right size for our dock. Well made and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy table. More heavy duty than I thought!
customer_reviews.author: judi batton

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: It not level, had to put a piece of cardboard under one leg
customer_reviews.author: Jessica cumbie

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a small patio. It is solid weight and attractive. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: begoodtoall

customer_reviews.title: Use a 10mm socket to tighten the screws, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: . Just received it, took maybe 15 minutes to assemble. Use a 10mm socket wrench if you do not wish to use the included stamped metal sheet wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Avraam Jack Dectis

customer_reviews.title: No chairs just table
customer_reviews.text: A little deceitful, I thought I was getting chairs too
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ozun

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece to compliment other patio furniture
customer_reviews.text: The table makes a very piece to set beside the glider I bought for our brick patio under a shade tree . . . a good place to put a drink and/or snacks to share, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't much of a challenge to put together. I keep it out on my deck and works well as an end table. Sturdy enough to hold some plants. Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what we needed - an outdoor table in a small space
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good size for small patios or balconies.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our small patio. Big enough for two diners. My partner use it as a desk too.
customer_reviews.author: Mic R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to hold my small blackstone grill. It works perfectly and very solidly built. I was able to purchase a cover that fit down the sides and don't worry about the rain anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: really sturdy table.
customer_reviews.text: this is the perfect size for my 8x20' porch. easy to clean and care for.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Size for Small Patio
customer_reviews.text: I used this table in a small patio area. The size is great. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Crumella Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The table "looks" okay from the top, but the ...
customer_reviews.text: The table "looks" okay from the top, but the interior edges around the glass are rusting already and it hasn't even been outside two months. I would return it if I didn't have to take it apart to ship it.
customer_reviews.author: ChiChi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size foe evening dining on our screen porch, quality is good and a=ssembly easy.

customer_reviews.title: Economical commercial quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent price for a mid to low end table, looks nice and decorative in a commercial setting.

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture 31.5'' Square Tempered Glass Metal Table
product_meta.description: Size:31.5 in.Create the perfect relaxing or entertainment environment with this patio table. This glass table will enhance your bistro, cafe, restaurant, hotel or home patio space. The ripple designed table top features a smooth surface for keeping items level. The table was designed for all-weather use making it a great option for indoor and outdoor settings. For longevity, care should be taken to protect from long periods of wet weather. A black powder coat finish lends the round-shaped table a bold, versatile appearance that matches well with your favorite chairs. [TLH-073A-2-GG]
